name: Instant Artist: Puzzle Mashup
description:
Who said it takes time and effort to become a great artist?

Simply tap to place pieces from up to four different puzzles and experiment until you're done! There are no wrong moves, no time limits, and no stress. Leave the pesky rules of art-making behind and focus on the creative process.

It's your chance to express your creativity without constraint. With no goals or deadlines and no pressure.

What emerges is a beautiful representation of your own thoughts and feelings.
